33 namespace TiledArray {
34 
36 
42 template <typename Arg, typename Scalar,
43  std::enable_if_t<TiledArray::detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>* = nullptr>
44 inline auto scale(const Arg& arg, const Scalar factor) {
45  return arg.scale(factor);
46 }
47 
49 
56 template <typename Arg, typename Scalar,
57  std::enable_if_t<TiledArray::detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>* = nullptr>
58 inline auto scale(const Arg& arg, const Scalar factor,
59  const Permutation& perm) {
60  return arg.scale(factor, perm);
61 }
62 
64 
70 template <typename Result, typename Scalar,
71  std::enable_if_t<TiledArray::detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>* = nullptr>
72 inline Result& scale_to(Result& result, const Scalar factor) {
73  return result.scale_to(factor);
74 }
75 
76 namespace tile_interface {
77 
78 template <typename... T>
79 using result_of_scale_t = decltype(scale(std::declval<T>()...));
80 
81 template <typename... T>
82 using result_of_scale_to_t = decltype(scale_to(std::declval<T>()...));
83 
84 template <typename Arg, typename Scalar, typename Enabler = void>
85 struct scale_trait {
86  typedef Arg type;
87 };
88 
89 template <typename Arg, typename Scalar>
90 struct scale_trait<Arg, Scalar,
91  typename std::enable_if<TiledArray::detail::is_type<
92  result_of_scale_t<Arg, Scalar>>::value>::type> {
93  typedef result_of_scale_t<Arg> type;
94 };
95 
96 template <typename Result, typename Arg, typename Scalar,
97  typename Enabler = void>
98 class Scale {
99  public:
100  static_assert(TiledArray::detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>,
101  "Cannot scale tiles by a non-scalar type");
102 
103  typedef Result result_type;
104  typedef Arg argument_type;
105  typedef Scalar scalar_type;
106 
107  result_type operator()(const argument_type& arg,
108  const scalar_type factor) const {
109  using TiledArray::scale;
110  return scale(arg, factor);
111  }
112 
113  result_type operator()(const argument_type& arg, const scalar_type factor,
114  const Permutation& perm) const {
115  using TiledArray::scale;
116  return scale(arg, factor, perm);
117  }
118 };
119 
120 template <typename Result, typename Arg, typename Scalar>
121 class Scale<Result, Arg, Scalar,
122  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<
123  Result, result_of_scale_t<Arg, Scalar>>::value>::type> {
124  public:
125  static_assert(TiledArray::detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>,
126  "Cannot scale tiles by a non-scalar type");
127 
128  typedef Result result_type;
129  typedef Arg argument_type;
130  typedef Scalar scalar_type;
131 
132  result_type operator()(const argument_type& arg,
133  const scalar_type factor) const {
134  using TiledArray::scale;
135  TiledArray::Cast<Result, result_of_scale_t<Arg, Scalar>> cast;
136  return cast(scale(arg, factor));
137  }
138 
139  result_type operator()(const argument_type& arg, const scalar_type factor,
140  const Permutation& perm) const {
141  using TiledArray::scale;
142  TiledArray::Cast<Result, result_of_scale_t<Arg, Scalar, Permutation>> cast;
143  return cast(scale(arg, factor, perm));
144  }
145 };
146 
147 template <typename Result, typename Arg, typename Scalar,
148  typename Enabler = void>
149 class ScaleTo {
150  public:
151  static_assert(TiledArray::detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>,
152  "Cannot scale tiles by a non-scalar type");
153 
154  typedef Result result_type;
155  typedef Arg argument_type;
156  typedef Scalar scalar_type;
157 
158  result_type operator()(argument_type& arg, const scalar_type factor) const {
159  using TiledArray::scale_to;
160  return scale_to(arg, factor);
161  }
162 };
163 
164 template <typename Result, typename Arg, typename Scalar>
165 class ScaleTo<Result, Arg, Scalar,
166  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<
167  Result, result_of_scale_t<Arg, Scalar>>::value>::type> {
168  public:
169  static_assert(TiledArray::detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>,
170  "Cannot scale tiles by a non-scalar type");
171 
172  typedef Result result_type;
173  typedef Arg argument_type;
174  typedef Scalar scalar_type;
175 
176  result_type operator()(const argument_type& arg,
177  const scalar_type factor) const {
178  using TiledArray::scale_to;
179  TiledArray::Cast<Result, result_of_scale_to_t<Arg, Scalar>> cast;
180  return cast(scale_to(arg, factor));
181  }
182 };
183 
184 } // namespace tile_interface

192 template <typename Arg, typename Scalar>
193 struct scale_trait
194  : public TiledArray::tile_interface::scale_trait<Arg, Scalar> {};

202 template <typename Result, typename Arg, typename Scalar>
203 class Scale : public TiledArray::tile_interface::Scale<Result, Arg, Scalar> {};
